about_the_game:
Take to the role of The InVincible Iron Ivy ("Iron Ivy") in this Soulslike 3rd person role-playing game (“RPG”) who has superpowers that harness properties encompassing concepts of science called "Sci-fi Powers."



Iron Ivy’s powers are labeled as Geokinesis, which provides her with the ability to manipulate and control both the elements of earth and nature. This dynamic includes synthesizing lightning bolts, controlling and manipulating, moisture, and barometric/atmospheric pressure to form, and manipulating gases and liquids to cause chemical reactions.



Additionally, she uses this ability to manipulate ivy leaves to make her ivy board that provides her with flight. Finally, Iron Ivy has the ability to transmute plants into humanoid and animaloid ("animal-like") creatures like her A.I. companions Sunny, Snapper, and Lily.



You will unlock Iron Ivy's Sci-FI Powers by accumulating experience points (“XP”), deactivating enemy troopers, acquiring items and special attributes, rare tools; and the exploration and completing quests.
detailed_description:
Take to the role of The InVincible Iron Ivy ("Iron Ivy") in this Soulslike 3rd person role-playing game (“RPG”) who has superpowers that harness properties encompassing concepts of science called "Sci-fi Powers."



Iron Ivy’s powers are labeled as Geokinesis, which provides her with the ability to manipulate and control both the elements of earth and nature. This dynamic includes synthesizing lightning bolts, controlling and manipulating, moisture, and barometric/atmospheric pressure to form, and manipulating gases and liquids to cause chemical reactions.



Additionally, she uses this ability to manipulate ivy leaves to make her ivy board that provides her with flight. Finally, Iron Ivy has the ability to transmute plants into humanoid and animaloid ("animal-like") creatures like her A.I. companions Sunny, Snapper, and Lily.



You will unlock Iron Ivy's Sci-FI Powers by accumulating experience points (“XP”), deactivating enemy troopers, acquiring items and special attributes, rare tools; and the exploration and completing quests.

movies.name: The InVincible Iron Ivy: Enter the Pretty, Pretty Princess Video Game Trailer

name: The InVincible Iron Ivy: Enter the Pretty, Pretty Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or similar)
  • Processor: 2 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or comparable grade of graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Players controllers should have enough buttons to accommodate all of the games features. Generally, the windows and XBox controllers work fine. Therefore, if your controller is comparable it should work fine, also.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (or similar)
  • Processor: 4 cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or high grade of graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Players controllers should have enough buttons to accommodate all of the games features. Generally, the windows and XBox controllers work fine. Therefore, if your controller is comparable it should work fine, also.

publishers: JCM Design of North Carolina, Incorporated
short_description: This game is a Soulslike Role-playing game that uses a progress system (“leveling system”) for measuring players’ rates of success. This version of the game is a single-player mode-only game.
